title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Global sign in and sign out

description.newValue:
,Teams iOS app will support Global sign-in and sign-out tosimplify the experience for Frontline Workers. Employees can now use any devicefrom the shared device pool to sign in with their credentials and sign out ofit at the end of the shift. This will remove all their personal and company information from the device.
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: November CY2022
